text: @realDonaldTrump You’re talking about this none sense while there’re 1.48 millions Americans filed for unemployment. Feds send stimulus checks to 1m deceased. 2,396,026 Covid19 cases in America and 121,996 deaths in America. And you’re talking about crap. When are you going to put America first?

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
